system.description: Centaurs are nomadic, energetic, and adventurous. They tend to prefer taking action over waiting for long discussions.
system.appearance: Upper body of a human with the body of a horse from the waist down.

overview.base:
Can wield @L[Property:Two-Handed]{two-handed} weapons in one hand.
Note: @L[Property:AP]{AP} weapons must still be wielded in two hands to be @L[Property:AV0]{AV0}.
@L[Category:Armor]{Armor} you wear must be custom-made to fit you.
